mapper.insert: insert into s_b_call_detail (main_id, call_order, biz_id, user_id, phone_num, call_time, call_result, dayu_result, result_time, create_time, modify_time, var_bak1, var_bak2, time_bak1, time_bak2 ) values (#{mainId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{callOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bizId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{phoneNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{callTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{callResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dayuResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resultTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{varBak1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{varBak2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timeBak1,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{timeBak2,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update: update s_b_call_detail set biz_id = #{bizId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, phone_num = #{phoneNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, call_time = #{callTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, call_result = #{callResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dayu_result = #{dayuResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, result_time = #{resultTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, var_bak1 = #{varBak1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, var_bak2 = #{varBak2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time_bak1 = #{timeBak1,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, time_bak2 = #{timeBak2,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where main_id = #{mainId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and call_order = #{callOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select main_id, call_order, biz_id, user_id, phone_num, call_time, call_result, dayu_result, result_time, create_time, modify_time, var_bak1, var_bak2, time_bak1, time_bak2 from s_b_call_detail
mapper.insert:
insert into s_b_call_detail (main_id, call_order, biz_id, user_id, phone_num, call_time, call_result, dayu_result, result_time, create_time, modify_time, var_bak1, var_bak2, time_bak1, time_bak2 ) values
(#{item.mainId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.callOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.bizId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.phoneNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.callTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.callResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dayuResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.resultTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.varBak1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.varBak2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.timeBak1,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.timeBak2,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.select: select main_id, call_order, biz_id, user_id, phone_num, call_time, call_result, dayu_result, result_time, create_time, modify_time, var_bak1, var_bak2, time_bak1, time_bak2 from s_b_call_detail where main_id = #{mainId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and call_result != '01' AND call_time IS NOT NULL ORDER BY call_time DESC LIMIT 1
